column1: Smoque BBQ////Fantastic BBQ .We drive along way to get here
column2: well worth the trip.Sides are just as good the Peach cobbler is one of the best I have ever had.Parking sucks
column3: but that part of being in the city.The service is good they have always been very friendly.Have not had to wait but we have been lucky
column4: the first time we went we got right in
column5: sat down with our food looked up and all of a sudden the line was out the door and down the sidewalk.
